Posts.Content: flute_dog I quite agree - it's strange, and not very pleasant but after 10 weeks it is either going or I'm getting used to it!  To start with I also had weird tickly feelings like ants running over the skin and the BCN said that was normal too.  Other people have discussed on this site the feeling of a cold drink running under the new implant as well.  I suppose it's all completely different and we must expect to be surprised!
Posts.Title: Strange muscley sensation after mastectomy?

Posts.Content: Hi, I am 2 weeks out after bilateral mastectomy with expanders. I am wondering if any of you have felt a weird bumping feeling like a small marble when you walk. It Is driving me crazy and it feels and looks like the expanders have not moved. Thanks
Posts.Title: Strange muscley sensation after mastectomy?

Posts.Content: Mine are temporary expanders. I do see my ps on the 29th so I will have him check. Thank you
Posts.Title: Strange muscley sensation after mastectomy?
